description: Oh, hey there, my name is Korg. As you can see… I am made of rocks. Perishable rocks though, so don’t put me into fights thinking I am invincible, unless my opponent is made of scissors. Ha! … Anyway, Miek is here too and wants to help , so instead of blocking with my rock arms, I let Miek taste some of the action! After all, that’s what friends are for!
